Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hello Sara,

I'm attaching another version of make_reports.pl. This is the one we use to clean up interrupted crawls for archive-it.org. (I didn't know about the one in the heritrix source tree until I saw this thread.)

I don't think this version will solve your problems, but maybe it will have something useful to you. For one thing it does create the [#robots] and [#remaining] columns in hosts-report.txt.

For our purposes, we don't need the output of the script to match heritrix exactly. Your best bet might be to debug and edit the script yourself, which I don't imagine should be too difficult.

Noah


sara.aubry@... wrote:
> hi Steve,
> 
> I meant make_reports.pl (with an s).
> The version you mentionned is the one I'm testing.
> 
> I can use it and it does produce reports from crawl.log but my problem 
> is rather the differences in the output. 
> 
> For instance, if I compare the two from the same crawl.log file:
> 
> crawl-report.txt in H1:
> Crawl Name: default
> Crawl Status: Finished
> Duration Time: 10h48m21s326ms
> Total Seeds Crawled: 5221
> Total Seeds not Crawled: 3543
> Total Hosts Crawled: 7407
> Total Documents Crawled: 742804
> Processed docs/sec: 9.2
> Bandwidth in Kbytes/sec: 278
> Total Raw Data Size in Bytes: 11080309933 (10 GB)
> Novel Bytes: 11080309933 (10 GB)
> 
> crawl-report.txt using make_reports.pl only has:
> Duration Time: 10h48m12s
> Total Hosts Crawled: 7407
> Total Documents Crawled: 321655
> Total Raw Data Size in Bytes: 10980204394 (10.23 GB)
> 
> ----------------------
> 
> host-report.txt
> H1 has 2 more columns [#robots] [#remaining]
> sorting is different
> #bytes is slightly different 
> in H1:
> [#urls] [#bytes] [host] [#robots] [#remaining]
> 7708 512752 dns: 0 0
> 999 80391492 060.cybelagence.net 0 0
> 999 39523225 media.ac3-distribution.com 0 0
> make_reports.pl:
> [#urls] [#bytes] [host]
> 999 27649220 www.ca-research.fr
> 999 22779563 www.cabinetdelahaye.fr
> 999 50862428 www.cabinet-patrice-ryaux.com
> 
> --------------------
> 
> mimetype-report.txt
> #bytes is slightly different
> in H1:
> 183133 3280875979 text/html
> make_reports.pl: 
> 183133 3228657315 text/html
> 
> ---------------------------
> 
> responsecode-report.txt in make_reports.pl is missing the "1" rescode
> 
> ----------------------------
> 
> seeds-report.txt
> H1 has 1 more column: [redirect]
> sorting is different
> in H1:
> code] [status] [seed] [redirect] (TRI)
> -2 NOTCRAWLED http://www.ca-chevreux.fr/
> -2 NOTCRAWLED http://www.cabinetasa.fr/
> -6 NOTCRAWLED http://ca-amt.fr/
> -6 NOTCRAWLED http://ca-antidecote.fr/
> make_reports.pl: 
> [res-code] [status] [seeds]
> -2 NOTCRAWLED http://www.ca-chevreux.fr/
> -2 NOTCRAWLED http://www.cabinetasa.fr/
> -5000 NOTCRAWLED http://caaeconnexion.asso.fr/
> -5000 NOTCRAWLED http://cab.fr/
> -5000 NOTCRAWLED http://cabaret-paris.fr/
> 
> For production management and preservation purposes, I'd really need 
> output to be identical.
> We also have a QA tool which compiles data from many Heritrix report files 
> and it is based on Heritrix report output.
> My bigger problems are information missing in the crawl-report, the 
> differences in bytes count, and the missing columns.
> 
> Any solution?
> 
> Thanks!
> 
> Sara
>

> Re: [archive-crawler] Up-to-date version of make_report.pl ?

> hi Sara,
> 
> just wanted to follow up with a bit more info. first off,
> are you pointing to the right script, precisely "make_reports.pl",
> rather than "make_report.pl" (without the "s" after report)?
> secondly, are you having a specific problem with the script?
> if so, please describe it, and maybe we can help you figure
> out the cause.
> 
> the version history of this script shows the last commit was:
> Revision 4208  - (download) (annotate)
> Wed Apr 12 21:35:00 2006 UTC (4 years ago) by gojomo
> File size: 5270 byte(s)
> 
> [ 1465369 ] make_reports.pl outdated, broken
> * make_reports.pl
>      adapt for new longer crawl.log lines; also integrate internal 
> changes improving (but not perfecting) congruence with native Heritrix 
> reports; changes reviewed for commit through freeze by stack
> 
> i ran the distro version of make_reports.pl without issue against
> output form a later build of H1. although there are some slight
> differences in the output generated by the script, and that which
> is given at runtime, they are largely compatible. here's a sample
> diff:
> 
> ==== diff crawl-report.txt crawl-report.txt.new
> 1,5c1
> < Crawl Name: eclipse-test
> < Crawl Status: Finished - Ended by operator
> < Duration Time: 33m24s48ms
> < Total Seeds Crawled: 1
> < Total Seeds not Crawled: 0
> ---
>  > Duration Time: 0h27m10s
> 7,13c3,4
> < Total Documents Crawled: 881
> ==== diff hosts-report.txt hosts-report.txt.new
> 1,148c1,147
> < [#urls] [#bytes] [host] [#robots] [#remaining] [#novel-urls] 
> [#novel-bytes] [#dup-by-hash-urls] [#dup-by-hash-bytes] 
> [#not-modified-urls] [#not-modified-bytes]
> < 284 8207847 www.archive.org 0 16 284 8207847 0 0 0 0
> < 146 9776 dns: 0 0 146 9776 0 0 0 0
> < 3 11332 i.creativecommons.org 0 0 3 11332 0 0 0 0
> < 2 1757 creativecommons.org 0 0 2 1757 0 0 0 0
> < 2 7511 deadlists.com 0 0 2 7511 0 0 0 0
> < 2 12608 tsunami.archive.org 0 0 2 12608 0 0 0 0
> < 2 1641 web.archive.org 0 0 2 1641 0 0 0 0
> < 2 4023 websearch.archive.org 0 0 2 4023 0 0 0 0
> ==== diff mimetype-report.txt mimetype-report.txt.new
> 2,12c2,11
> < 232 7194217 text/html
> < 146 9776 text/dns
> < 143 45286 text/plain
> < 23 36913 image/gif
> < 12 187948 image/jpeg
> < 8 504973 text/xml
> < 7 14617 image/png
> < 6 265301 application/x-javascript
> < 2 28788 text/css
> ==== diff responsecode-report.txt responsecode-report.txt.new
> 3d2
> < 1 146
> ==== diff seeds-report.txt seeds-report.txt.new
> 1c1
> < [code] [status] [seed] [redirect]
> ---
>  > [res-code] [status] [seeds]
> 
> 
> /steve@...
> 
> 
> 
> On 4/19/10 11:13 AM, steve@... wrote:
>>
>> hi Sara,
>>
>> the script you're looking for can be found in the H1.14.3
>> distribution at: bin/make_reports.pl in our SourceForge
>> project: http://sourceforge.net/projects/archive-crawler/
>> <http://sourceforge.net/projects/archive-crawler/>
>>
>> let us know if you're having problems with this version
>> of the script otherwise.
>>
>> /steve@... <mailto:%2Fsteve%40archive.org>
>>
>> On 4/19/10 6:13 AM, sara.aubry@... <mailto:sara.aubry%40bnf.fr> 
> wrote:
>>  > Hi all,
>>  >
>>  > Is there an up-to-date version of the script make_report.pl which
>> would be
>>  > compatible with Heritrix 1.14.3 report format?
>>  > Even an unofficial one that some of you could use for internal 
> purposes?
>>  >
>>  > Some jobs of our national domain crawl are missing reports and we 
> would
>>  > like to generate them as a post-processing operation?
>>  >
>>  > I didn't find any information in the list archive after october 2006.
>>  >
>>  > Thanks for your help !
>>  >
>>  > Sara Aubry
>>  > National Library of France (BnF)
>>
>>
>
